title: Cuteness Is Unbeatable!
detail_text: <:th_ch0103/>Kasumi-chan, isn’t this.... a little hard for me?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>What are you saying, Kanan-senpai. This shouldn’t even be a challenge. We’re just getting started, you know?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>No, but.... It’s more like, stuff like lace ribbons or floral patterns aren’t really for me.... okay?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>You don’t understand your own cuteness, huh, Kanan-senpai! Well, you may not be as cute as Kasumin, but you’re pretty cute yourself.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Eeeeeeh....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Kasumin will bring out the part of you that you never knew about! Then surely you’ll understand, Kanan-senpai! The fact that cuteness is unbeatable!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Huh, I guess I can do it if I try....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Kasumin was the one who did it. But! Look~, Kasumin has made you so cute that even you have to admit it, Kanan-senpai! You were also cute when wearing Aqours outfits, of course, but Kasumin thought that you had a ton of potential even in your regular clothes, Kanan-senpai~  Kasumin was right~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Hmm, honestly, this is my defeat. Thank you, Kasumi-chan!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
